original: @328a ` // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs kyi smon lam bzhugs /
analyzed: @328a ` // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs kyi smon lam bzhugs /
translated: The Noble Aspiration of the Side of the Perfection of Wisdom

original: # // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa klog gi dus su smon lam du gsol pa /
analyzed: # // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa klog gi dus su smon lam du gsol pa /
translated: The Aspiration Prayer at the Time of Reading the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Verses and so forth

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na /
translated: In the ten directions, in the inconceivable, infinite world systems,

original: ston pa bla na med pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: ston pa bla na med pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
translated: there are the unsurpassed teachers, the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: zhi ba chos kyi sku /
analyzed: zhi ba chos kyi sku /
translated: They are the peaceful dharmakƒÅya,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with the wisdom of omniscience,

original: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos kyis brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with the strengths, fearlessnesses, and unshared qualities.

original: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la ston pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la ston pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
translated: With the perception of the sublime teacher, I respectfully pay homage to all the buddhas of the ten directions and three times and go for refuge with faith.

original: bstan pa bla na med pa dam pa'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag cing rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: bstan pa bla na med pa dam pa'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag cing rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba /
translated: The unsurpassed teachings, the sublime Dharma, are by nature pure and naturally liberated.

original: 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul /
analyzed: 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul /
translated: It is the domain of the wisdom of the noble ones‚Äô individual self-knowledge.

original: rnam grangs byis pa lta bu'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa /
analyzed: rnam grangs byis pa lta bu'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa /
translated: It is not the domain of the childish who rely on words.üîΩIt is the Dharma of the ultimate truth, the path of the noble ones, which is included in the eightfold noble path, the path that all the noble ones of the three times have traversed.

original: don dam pa'i chos dang / dus gsum gyi 'phags pa thams cad gshegs pa'i shul lam gyi chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis bsdus pa dang / bstan pa'i chos skyes bu chen po'i dpal gyi mgur nas legs par gsungs pa /
analyzed: don dam pa'i chos dang / dus gsum gyi 'phags pa thams cad gshegs pa'i shul lam gyi chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis bsdus pa dang / bstan pa'i chos skyes bu chen po'i dpal gyi mgur nas legs par gsungs pa /
translated: It is the Dharma of the teachings, the excellent speech of the great being,

original: thog mar dge ba /üîΩbar du dge ba /
analyzed: thog mar dge ba / bar du dge ba /
translated: virtuous in the beginning,üîΩvirtuous in the middle,

original: tha mar dge ba /
analyzed: tha mar dge ba /
translated: and virtuous in the end.

original: don bzang zhing tshig 'bru gsal ba /üîΩmngon par mtho ba /
analyzed: don bzang zhing tshig 'bru gsal ba / mngon par mtho ba /
translated: It has an excellent meaning and is expressed in excellent words.üîΩIt is the path of the higher realms

original: nges par legs pa'i lam du gyur pa /
analyzed: nges par legs pa'i lam du gyur pa /
translated: and the definite goodness of liberation.üîΩIt is the sacred Dharma of the s≈´tras, the vinaya, the abhidharma, and the commentaries, all of which are expressed in syllables and words.

original: mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa bstan bcos la sogs pa dam pa'i chos yi ge 'bru gnyer gyis bsnyad pa thams cad la bstan pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa bstan bcos la sogs pa dam pa'i chos yi ge 'bru gnyer gyis bsnyad pa thams cad la bstan pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
translated: I pay homage with respect, with the perception that they are the sacred teachings, and I go for refuge with faith.

original: sgrub pa bla na med pa /
analyzed: sgrub pa bla na med pa /
translated: It is the unsurpassed practice.

original: 'phags @328b pa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa lnga las shin tu 'das pa /
analyzed: 'phags @328b pa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa lnga las shin tu 'das pa /
translated: The noble Sangha, the bodhisattva mahasattvas, who have transcended the five fears,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i go 'phang brnyes pa /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i go 'phang brnyes pa /
translated: who have attained the level of irreversibility,

original: sa chen po la rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis rim par bzhugs pa /
analyzed: sa chen po la rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis rim par bzhugs pa /
translated: who abide in stages on the great grounds through the distinctions of realization,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras /
translated: the heart sons of the tathagatas,

original: 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal mgon du gyur cing /
analyzed: 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal mgon du gyur cing /
translated: who have become the glory and protector of all beings,üîΩwho are dedicated to benefiting all sentient beings, those who have taken on physical form,

original: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa sku nyams su bzhes pa rnams dang / 'phags pha rang sangs rgyas rang gi shes rab kyi rtsal gyis go zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa sku nyams su bzhes pa rnams dang / 'phags pha rang sangs rgyas rang gi shes rab kyi rtsal gyis go zhing /
translated: the arhats who are pratyekabuddhas, who understand through the power of their own wisdom,üîΩwho benefit through their miracles by attaining mastery over concentration and samadhi,

original: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas rdzu 'phrul gyis don mdzad pa rnams dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa gnas brtan chen po mchog bcu drug la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs las byung ba'i sras /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas rdzu 'phrul gyis don mdzad pa rnams dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa gnas brtan chen po mchog bcu drug la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs las byung ba'i sras /
translated: and the shravaka arhats, the sixteen great elders and so forth, who are the sons born from the speech of the tathagatas,

original: chos las skyes pa /
analyzed: chos las skyes pa /
translated: who are born from the dharma,

original: rang gi don rjes su thob pa /
analyzed: rang gi don rjes su thob pa /
translated: who have attained their own benefit,

original: srid par kun du sbyor ba /
analyzed: srid par kun du sbyor ba /
translated: They are completely free from the fetters of existence.

original: yongs su zad pa /
analyzed: yongs su zad pa /
translated: They have exhausted all that binds them to existence.

original: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi cha las rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi cha las rnam par grol ba /
translated: They are liberated through the power of both wisdom and samadhi.

original: lha dang mi'i 'jig rten kun gyis mchod cing phyag bya bar 'os pa thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mchod gnas dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i 'jig rten kun gyis mchod cing phyag bya bar 'os pa thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mchod gnas dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
translated: They are worthy of the homage and offerings of all the worlds of gods and humans. I pay homage to them all with respect, regarding them as spiritual teachers and as holy objects of offering. With faith and devotion, I go for refuge.

original: khyad par du yang dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
analyzed: khyad par du yang dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
translated: In particular, I pay homage to the mother of all the Sugatas of the three times,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo dang / sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa thams cad bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'ang 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo dang / sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa thams cad bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'ang 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
translated: to the goddesses of the ten paramitas, such as the transcendent perfection of wisdom, the Bhagavati Prajnaparamita, and to the Buddhas, the sons of the Buddhas, and the Bodhisattvas of the ten directions, together with their infinite retinues. I, [insert your name], together with my retinue,

original: mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid rab tu dang bas gus par phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid rab tu dang bas gus par phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
translated: With a pure body, speech, and mind, I respectfully bow down and go for refuge to all sentient beings, limitless as the sky, and make offerings to them.

original: dkon mchog gsum 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa phyag gi gnas bsod nams thams cad kyi dpal gyi zhing mthu dang yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab ba thams cad la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mchod do //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa phyag gi gnas bsod nams thams cad kyi dpal gyi zhing mthu dang yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab ba thams cad la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mchod do //
translated: I, [your name here], make offerings to the Three Jewels, together with their limitless retinues, the objects of my prostrations, the field of glory of all merit, endowed with inconceivable power and qualities.

original: bstod do // bsngags so //
analyzed: bstod do // bsngags so //
translated: I praise them, I extol them,

original: lus dbul lo //
analyzed: lus dbul lo //
translated: I offer my body,

original: srog phyogs so //
analyzed: srog phyogs so //
translated: I offer my life,üîΩI offer all my possessions

original: dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas de dag thams @329a * //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas de dag thams @329a * //
translated: to the Three Jewels, the objects of my offerings.

original: cad la mchod par dbul ba /
analyzed: cad la mchod par dbul ba /
translated: I offer to all of themüîΩthe offerings of the bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba /
translated: arising from the blessings of those who have realized the dharmadhƒÅtu.

original: gser gyi padma 'dab ma stong dang / gzhan yang mchod pa bla na med pa dang / bla na med pa'i lha'i me tog dang / lta'i bdug spos dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i na bza' dang / rgyan dang /
analyzed: gser gyi padma 'dab ma stong dang / gzhan yang mchod pa bla na med pa dang / bla na med pa'i lha'i me tog dang / lta'i bdug spos dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i na bza' dang / rgyan dang /
translated: with golden lotuses with a thousand petals, and with other unsurpassed offerings, with unsurpassed divine flowers, divine incense, divine garlands, divine unguents, divine clothes, ornaments,üîΩparasols, victory banners, and flags.

original: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bgyi'o //
analyzed: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bgyi'o //
translated: We will serve them.

original: bkur stir bgyi'o //üîΩphu dud du bgyi'o //
analyzed: bkur stir bgyi'o // phu dud du bgyi'o //
translated: We will honor them.üîΩWe will make offerings to them.üîΩWe will respect them.

original: mchod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: mchod par bgyi'o //
translated: We will praise them.

original: gzhan yang skad cig thang cig yud tsam la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang skad cig thang cig yud tsam la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te /
translated: Moreover, in an instant, a short moment, a small fraction of time, may this trichiliocosm be filled with various jewels.

original: me tog gi si lam sna tshogs kyis kun du gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po mang po kun du bres pa dang / snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos mang po 'thul ba dang / dpag bsam gyi shing mang po'i yal ga'i rtse mo g-yur za ba dang /
analyzed: me tog gi si lam sna tshogs kyis kun du gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po mang po kun du bres pa dang / snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos mang po 'thul ba dang / dpag bsam gyi shing mang po'i yal ga'i rtse mo g-yur za ba dang /
translated: It is filled with various flower garlands,üîΩhung with many silk tassels and streamers,üîΩperfum√©d with many incenses from various vessels,üîΩand the tips of the branches of many wish-fulfilling trees are bent down with fruit.

original: me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / phreng ba'i spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur pa /
analyzed: me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / phreng ba'i spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur pa /
translated: It is completely adorned with various trees of flowers, trees of fruits, trees of incense, and trees of various garlands and perfumes.

original: bla na ma mchis pa mchod par 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol lo //üîΩda ltar gyi mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa dngos su 'byor pa rnams kyang /
analyzed: bla na ma mchis pa mchod par 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol lo // da ltar gyi mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa dngos su 'byor pa rnams kyang /
translated: Please accept this unsurpassable offering.

original: lha dang mi'i mchod pa khyad par can rgya chen por sprul pas yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te /
analyzed: lha dang mi'i mchod pa khyad par can rgya chen por sprul pas yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te /
translated: The five types of offerings and so forth that are actually available are emanated as special, vast offerings of gods and humans.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mngon sum dang 'dra bar dmigs te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mngon sum dang 'dra bar dmigs te /
translated: The ten perfections, and the buddhas of the ten directions, together with their retinues, are visualized as if they were actually present.

original: mchod par dbul gyis bzhes su gsol lo //
analyzed: mchod par dbul gyis bzhes su gsol lo //
translated: Offerings are presented to them, and they are requested to accept them.

original: bdag gir mdzad du gsol lo //
analyzed: bdag gir mdzad du gsol lo //
translated: They are requested to take possession of them.

original: longs spyad nas mnyes shing dbyes pa chen por mdzad du gsol lo //
analyzed: longs spyad nas mnyes shing dbyes pa chen por mdzad du gsol lo //
translated: Having enjoyed them, they are requested to be pleased and to have great delight.

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba /
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba /
translated: I, by the name so-and-so,

original: 'khor ba thog ma mchis pa nas /
analyzed: 'khor ba thog ma mchis pa nas /
translated: from beginningless cyclic existence,

original: yang dag pa'i don ma mthong ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don ma mthong ste /
translated: have not seen the perfect meaning.

original: phyin ci log gis bslad nas /
analyzed: phyin ci log gis bslad nas /
translated: Corrupted by error,

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dang / me dge @329b bcu spyod pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las bgyis pa dang / sems can gzhan la gnod pa'i las rnam pa mang po bgyis pas /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dang / me dge @329b bcu spyod pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las bgyis pa dang / sems can gzhan la gnod pa'i las rnam pa mang po bgyis pas /
translated: I have committed nonvirtuous actions, the five heinous acts, the five actions that are almost as heinous, the ten nonvirtuous actions, denigrating the noble ones, and abandoning the sublime Dharma, and I have committed many other harmful actions.

original: 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur cing /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur cing /
translated: These have become the causes for cyclic existence and the lower realms.

original: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgrib par gyur pa /
analyzed: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgrib par gyur pa /
translated: They are the obscurations to the higher realms and to liberation.

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis so 'tshal thams cad mi 'chab mi sbed par gnod zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so //üîΩ'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis so 'tshal thams cad mi 'chab mi sbed par gnod zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so // 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa /
translated: Whatever non-virtuous actions I have done, I confess them all without hiding anything, with a mind of regret and remorse.üîΩI rejoice in all the virtuous roots of the mundane and supramundane dharmas, together with their causes and results,

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa /
translated: which are included in the compounded and uncompounded.

original: rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad la shin tu rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad la shin tu rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice with the highest rejoicing in all the virtuous roots of the side of complete purity.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag dam pa'i chos btsun par mdzad pa'i slad du nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag dam pa'i chos btsun par mdzad pa'i slad du nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas nas /
translated: I rejoice in the TathƒÅgatas who, in order to make the holy Dharma pure, abide in inner correct meditative absorption,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor zhing bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis bden pa bzhi'i tshul du bskor nas dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i char dbab par bskul zhing gsol lo //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor zhing bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis bden pa bzhi'i tshul du bskor nas dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i char dbab par bskul zhing gsol lo //
translated: I request those who have not turned the wheel of Dharma and who remain in the state of being requested to turn the wheel of Dharma to turn the wheel of Dharma in the manner of the four truths, and to rain down the nectar of the sacred Dharma.

original: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad nas /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad nas /
translated: I request those Sugatas who, having acted for the benefit of those to be tamed,

original: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing /
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing /
translated: have demonstrated that all conditioned things are impermanent,

original: 'byor pa thams cad rgud par bstan te /
analyzed: 'byor pa thams cad rgud par bstan te /
translated: that all prosperity declines,

original: 'jig rten mi rtag par bstan pa'i slad du /
analyzed: 'jig rten mi rtag par bstan pa'i slad du /
translated: and that the world is impermanent,

original: rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig nas /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig nas /
translated: and who, having dismantled their vajra-like bodies,

original: thabs kyis mya ngan 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag la yang thugs rje chen po'i gzugs kyis 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing /
analyzed: thabs kyis mya ngan 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag la yang thugs rje chen po'i gzugs kyis 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing /
translated: wish to demonstrate the way of passing into nirvana through skillful means, to not pass into nirvana for as long as samsara is not emptied, through the form of great compassion.

original: 'jig rten na yun ring por bzhugs nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten na yun ring por bzhugs nas /
translated: I request them to remain in the world for a long time,

original: lha dang mi'i ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs so //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs so //
translated: and to remain as teachers of gods and humans and as spiritual friends.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gis sems can ma lus pa'i don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gis sems can ma lus pa'i don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the TathƒÅgatas have aroused the mind of unexcelled enlightenment for the sake of all sentient beings without exception,

original: bdag gis kyang dus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol te /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol te /
translated: in the same way, I too, at all times and in all situations, take refuge in the Three Jewels

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //üîΩde ltar phyag @330a * //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o // de ltar phyag @330a * //
translated: and arouse the mind of unexcelled enlightenment.üîΩHaving thus paid homage and aroused the mind of enlightenment,

original: 'tshal ba nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / srung ma thugs dam can mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'tshal ba nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / srung ma thugs dam can mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with the roots of virtue from that, and with the protectors, the oath-bound ones, the lord of the SahƒÅ world, BrahmƒÅ, the lord of the gods ≈öakra, the four great kings, and so forth, together with their infinite retinues,

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba /
translated: who have seen the Buddha,

original: chos thos pa bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa /
analyzed: chos thos pa bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa /
translated: heard the Dharma, and promised to protect the teachings,

original: lha'i dge bsnyen chen po de dag la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod rgya chen po bstabs shing phul ba dang / 'gro ba ris khams gsum gyis bsdus pa /
analyzed: lha'i dge bsnyen chen po de dag la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod rgya chen po bstabs shing phul ba dang / 'gro ba ris khams gsum gyis bsdus pa /
translated: and to all the beings of the three realms,

original: lam rgyud lngar 'khor zhing /
analyzed: lam rgyud lngar 'khor zhing /
translated: who wander in the five paths and six realms,üîΩborn from the four modes of birth,

original: 'gro ba ris drug tu skye gnas rnam pa bzhi las skyes pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba ris drug tu skye gnas rnam pa bzhi las skyes pa /
translated: and to all the beings of the six realms,

original: ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa /
analyzed: ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa /
translated: who are included in the category of sentient beings,üîΩhe dedicated vast offerings of tormas of giving and offering through the four ways of gathering.

original: sems can bsdu bar bsdus pa thams cad la yang bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen pos khyab par bsngos pa dang / tshe rabs brgyud pa nas lan chags par gyur pa'i bgegs rnams la yang /
analyzed: sems can bsdu bar bsdus pa thams cad la yang bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen pos khyab par bsngos pa dang / tshe rabs brgyud pa nas lan chags par gyur pa'i bgegs rnams la yang /
translated: He also dedicated vast offerings of tormas of giving and offering to the obstructing forces who have been his debtors throughout his series of lives,

original: gnas dang / dus dang / longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po bsngos shing stsal ba /
analyzed: gnas dang / dus dang / longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po bsngos shing stsal ba /
translated: offering them whatever place, time, and enjoyments they desired.

original: de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang bdag cag gi snga slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis so 'tshal gyi mthu dang / khyad par du yang yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang bdag cag gi snga slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis so 'tshal gyi mthu dang / khyad par du yang yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs te /
translated: By the power of such roots of virtue, and also by the power of the roots of virtue that we have created in the past, and in particular, by the power of the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines and so forth,

original: shes rab rnam gsum gyi don du gsungs pa'i phyogs /
analyzed: shes rab rnam gsum gyi don du gsungs pa'i phyogs /
translated: which were taught for the sake of the three kinds of wisdom,

original: g-yo sgyu med par bris pa dang / bklags shing ston pa dang / mchod cing rim gro bgyis pa dang ; rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / lha dang drang srong la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /
analyzed: g-yo sgyu med par bris pa dang / bklags shing ston pa dang / mchod cing rim gro bgyis pa dang ; rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / lha dang drang srong la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /
translated: we have written without deceit, and we have read, taught, made offerings, and served them, and by the power of the knowledge-mantras and secret mantras, and by the splendor of all the vidyƒÅdharas, such as gods and ·πõ·π£is,

original: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
analyzed: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
translated: and by the blessing of the truth,

original: bdag cag gis mchod pa bshams pa'i gnas 'di /
analyzed: bdag cag gis mchod pa bshams pa'i gnas 'di /
translated: in this place where we have arranged the offerings,

original: sngon bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la /
analyzed: sngon bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la /
translated: formerly on Vulture Peak Mountain,

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du /
translated: the BhagavƒÅn ≈öƒÅkyamuni, in the midst of the entire assembly,

original: yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bstan cing bshad pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bstan cing bshad pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the mother Praj√±ƒÅpƒÅramitƒÅ is extensively taught and explained,üîΩmay the natural ma·πá·∏çala be purified.

original: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par gyur cig / yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @330b sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par gyur cig / yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @330b sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas pa /
translated: The mother Praj√±ƒÅpƒÅramitƒÅ, the buddhas of the ten directions, and the retinue of excellent assemblies

original: pho brang gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs te /
analyzed: pho brang gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs te /
translated: are invited to this pure ma·πá·∏çala palace.

original: mchod pa dang / bklags pa dang / mdo sde dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang / dngos grub kyi cho ga dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i dbang dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad tshe rabs gang skyes gang gnas kyang /
analyzed: mchod pa dang / bklags pa dang / mdo sde dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang / dngos grub kyi cho ga dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i dbang dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad tshe rabs gang skyes gang gnas kyang /
translated: Through the empowerment of reading, reciting, the s≈´tras, the secret mantra texts of the unequaled, the sƒÅdhana rituals, and the offerings, may we and all infinite sentient beings, wherever we are born and wherever we stay,

original: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni byang /
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni byang /
translated: purify all the obscurations of karma and afflictions.

original: ngan song gsum dang / mi khom brgyad la sogs pa sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yang dag par grol zhing thar te /
analyzed: ngan song gsum dang / mi khom brgyad la sogs pa sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yang dag par grol zhing thar te /
translated: May they be completely liberated and freed from all suffering, including the three lower realms and the eight states lacking opportunity.

original: bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas 'phags pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong ste /
analyzed: bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas 'phags pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong ste /
translated: May they be born in the higher realms, in the world of the gods, and there behold the faces of all the noble beings.

original: phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste /
translated: May the Buddha place his right hand, which is the color of gold, upon their heads and

original: rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhes bgyi bar /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhes bgyi bar /
translated: prophesy to them, saying, ‚ÄúSon of noble family, in the future, in such and such a world system,

original: sangs rgyas 'di lta bu zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa myur du thob nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'di lta bu zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa myur du thob nas /
translated: you will become the Buddha known as so and so.‚Äù

original: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su myur du 'grub par gyur cig / sangs rgyas su ma grub kyi bar du 'jig rten 'di dag tu yang /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su myur du 'grub par gyur cig / sangs rgyas su ma grub kyi bar du 'jig rten 'di dag tu yang /
translated: May they quickly attain such a prophecy, and may they swiftly accomplish unsurpassable buddhahood.

original: tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel /
analyzed: tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel /
translated: And until they do so, may they enjoy long lives, good health, and increasing wealth.

original: rigs rgyud rgyas shing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra bgegs bar du gcod pa cis kyang mi tshugs shing /
analyzed: rigs rgyud rgyas shing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra bgegs bar du gcod pa cis kyang mi tshugs shing /
translated: May they be untroubled by any enemies, hindrances, or obstacles, whether human or nonhuman.üîΩMay all their mundane and supramundane wishes be fulfilled.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig / khyad par du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig / khyad par du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la /
translated: And in particular, since the benefits of practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos spyod rnam pa bcu'i sgo nas tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab na yang /
analyzed: chos spyod rnam pa bcu'i sgo nas tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab na yang /
translated: through the ten kinds of Dharma activity are inconceivable,

original: mdor bsdus pa bcu ste /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa bcu ste /
translated: they are summarized as ten.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sras su dgongs shing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sras su dgongs shing /
translated: All the buddhas think of them as their children.

original: byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang / tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa'i srung ma khyad par can rnams kyis bu bzhin du skyong bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang dbang / phyug phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren @331a * //
analyzed: byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang / tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa'i srung ma khyad par can rnams kyis bu bzhin du skyong bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang dbang / phyug phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren @331a * //
translated: You will be blessed, and special guardians such as Brahma and Indra will protect you as if you were their own child. You will have perfect longevity, power, and wealth. You will be free from obstacles and hindrances.üîΩ

original: la sogs pa gdon thams cad kyi bsam sbyor ngan pas mi tshugs pa dang / gza' skar dang rmi ltas la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: la sogs pa gdon thams cad kyi bsam sbyor ngan pas mi tshugs pa dang / gza' skar dang rmi ltas la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: You will be blessed, and special guardians such as Brahma and Indra will protect you like a son. You will have perfect life, power, and wealth. You will not be harmed by the negative intentions and actions of all the demons, such as obstacles and misguiders. All negative signs, such as planets, stars, and dreams, will be pacified. All enemy armies will be repelled.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad bos pa bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang mi skol bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan thams cad bos pa bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang mi skol bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba dang /
translated: and may we directly behold the face of the Tathagata.üîΩMay we attain the state of the unsurpassable Buddha, and so on.üîΩMay we and our retinue come to possess the infinite and wondrous qualities of the Buddha.

original: mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba rnams bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la smin cing grub par gyur cig / khyad par du yang bod kyi rgyal khams su sangs
analyzed: mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba rnams bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la smin cing grub par gyur cig / khyad par du yang bod kyi rgyal khams su sangs
translated: In particular, may the Buddha's teachings spread and flourish in the land of Tibet,

original: rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring por bzhugs par gyur cig /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs su yang ngan sems kyi 'khrugs pa mi 'byung ba dang / mi nad dang phyugs nad rgyun chad pa dang / lo phyug rtag tu legs /üîΩchar chu dus su phebs bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te /
analyzed: rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring por bzhugs par gyur cig /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs su yang ngan sems kyi 'khrugs pa mi 'byung ba dang / mi nad dang phyugs nad rgyun chad pa dang / lo phyug rtag tu legs / char chu dus su phebs bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te /
translated: May epidemics among humans and livestock cease, and may the harvest always be good.üîΩMay there be an abundance of happiness and well-being, and may all beings have the excellent intention to engage in virtue.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba spyod pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang ba'i gang zag log sred can bstan pa gzhig pa'i ngan sems dang ldan pa rnams ni chu shing gi rtsa ba bzhin du gyur
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba spyod pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang ba'i gang zag log sred can bstan pa gzhig pa'i ngan sems dang ldan pa rnams ni chu shing gi rtsa ba bzhin du gyur
translated: May those individuals who are hostile to the teachings of the Buddha, who are of evil intent and wish to destroy the teachings, be like plantain trees, whose fruits are their roots.

original: cig / dkon mchog gsum la dad cing dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams ni tshe ring zhing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig / bdag dang sems can thams cad rnam pa kun tu /
analyzed: cig / dkon mchog gsum la dad cing dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams ni tshe ring zhing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig / bdag dang sems can thams cad rnam pa kun tu /
translated: May I and all sentient beings,üîΩthrough the blessing of the truth of the Three Jewels

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin rlabs dang // dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyi mthu byin gyis //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin rlabs dang // dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyi mthu byin gyis //
translated: and the power of the Mother of the Buddhas of the three times,

original: gang dang gang na ji ltar gnas pa yi //üîΩsgrib dang sdug bsngal ma lus kun bsal te //
analyzed: gang dang gang na ji ltar gnas pa yi // sgrib dang sdug bsngal ma lus kun bsal te //
translated: in all our lives, wherever we are born,üîΩmay all obscurations and sufferings be completely cleared away.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab bsnyil nas //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab bsnyil nas //
translated: May all the sufferings of samsara be completely eliminated.

original: rgyud drug 'gro ba ma lus kun @331b bsgral te //
analyzed: rgyud drug 'gro ba ma lus kun @331b bsgral te //
translated: May all beings of the six realms be completely liberated.

original: kun du bzang po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i zhing //
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i zhing //
translated: The field of activity of the practice of Samantabhadra,

original: rin chen mdzes pa rnam bkod bde ba can //
analyzed: rin chen mdzes pa rnam bkod bde ba can //
translated: is the beautiful and preciously adorned Sukhavati,

original: bdud rtsi'i mtsho dang dpag bsam shing dang ldan //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i mtsho dang dpag bsam shing dang ldan //
translated: the lake of nectar and the wish-fulfilling tree.

original: der 'byung skal ldan padma'i mchog las skyes //
analyzed: der 'byung skal ldan padma'i mchog las skyes //
translated: There, the fortunate ones are born from a supreme lotus.

original: yid bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa'i sa //
analyzed: yid bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa'i sa //
translated: And the perfect wish-fulfilling state of the noble grounds.

original: rnam dag khyad par can gyi gnas mchog der //
analyzed: rnam dag khyad par can gyi gnas mchog der //
translated: In that supreme place of special purity,

original: thogs med rdzus te bde bar gshegs gyur nas //
analyzed: thogs med rdzus te bde bar gshegs gyur nas //
translated: Unimpededly, miraculously, may I attain bliss and go to the Sugata.

original: mtshan tsam thos pas sgrib pa rnam sel ba //
analyzed: mtshan tsam thos pas sgrib pa rnam sel ba //
translated: By merely hearing the name, may I clear away obscurations,

original: rin chen 'od 'bar sku mchog 'gro ba'i skyabs //
analyzed: rin chen 'od 'bar sku mchog 'gro ba'i skyabs //
translated: Precious one, blazing with light, supreme body, refuge of beings,

original: tshe dang longs spyod dpag med sbyin pa'i gtso //
analyzed: tshe dang longs spyod dpag med sbyin pa'i gtso //
translated: Granting immeasurable life and enjoyments, chief of generosity,

original: snang ba mtha' yas 'gro don mngon sum ste //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas 'gro don mngon sum ste //
translated: Boundless Light, directly benefiting migrators,

original: de las mchog thob lung bsten dbang bskur nas //
analyzed: de las mchog thob lung bsten dbang bskur nas //
translated: Having attained the supreme from you, empowered and prophesied,

original: rgyal sras gnyis dang spyod pa'i blo mthun zhing //
analyzed: rgyal sras gnyis dang spyod pa'i blo mthun zhing //
translated: In accord with the two heirs of the Victor, in accord with the mind of conduct,

original: phyogs bcur 'gro la phan pa'i don mdzad nas //
analyzed: phyogs bcur 'gro la phan pa'i don mdzad nas //
translated: Having acted for the benefit of migrators in the ten directions,üîΩMay I become the refuge of the three existences.

original: srid gsum yongs kyi skyabs su gyur par shog /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs kyi smon lam rdzogs so//
analyzed: srid gsum yongs kyi skyabs su gyur par shog /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs kyi smon lam rdzogs so//
translated: The noble perfection of wisdom's directional aspiration is complete.
